verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Since I have been redeemed,
Since I have been redeemed,

verse.name: c1b
v1a
verse.lines:
I have a song I love to sing,
Since I have been redeemed,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Of my Redeemer, Saviour, King,
Since I have been redeemed.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I have a Christ that satisfies,
Since I have been redeemed.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
To do His will my highest prize,
Since I have been redeemed.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I have a witness bright
and clear,
Since I have been redeemed.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Dispelling every doubt
and fear,
Since I have been redeemed.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
Where I shall dwell eternally,
Since I have been redeemed.
